title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Artificial Intelligence: Science Education Utilizing the Productive Disciplinary Engagement (PDE) Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific fields and comprehension of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Apply the five core elements of the PDE framework (shared participation, reproducible knowledge building, etc.) to science lesson design
Compare and analyze existing instructional design case studies from a PDE perspective and propose effectiveness evaluation criteria
Design microlearning-based science education materials executable in limited technological environments (smartphones)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
